wikipedia_page.main: Andrew Alexander Kiwomya (born 20 May 1996) is an English professional footballer who plays for Gibraltar National League club Bruno's Magpies as a winger and forward.

response: His nephew is Alex Kiwomya, the son of his brother Andy Kiwomya.
* Alex Kiwomya, footballer currently signed to Doncaster Rovers
His son is Alex Kiwomya and his brother is Chris Kiwomya.

Loanees Patrick Bamford and Alex Davey had their loan deals extended to the end of the season, to Middlesbrough and Scunthorpe United respectively, while John Swift returned from his unsuccessful loan spell to Rotherham United and was subsequently sent to Swindon Town. Striker Alex Kiwomya was also sent to Barnsley on a one-month loan.
